name: Micro Doc
description:
A Game made by Red Scale Studio using Unity. 

Micro Doc is a Top Down Action Shooter Game where you have to clean up all pathogens inside a sick body. BUT! With a tiny twist! You play as the doctor who invented a device that can shrink your body to a microscopic level and in turn, you get to explore deeper and deeper into the wonderful, or not so wonderful, world of the human anatomy.

Game Designer: https://twitter.com/lontramarota 

Programmer: https://twitter.com/D4rkFaiL 

2D Artist: https://twitter.com/Raffez_xD ||| https://www.artstation.com/raffez ||| rafaconstcontact@gmail.com

Sound Designer: https://twitter.com/HecaZer0 ||| leo.v.campos2017@gmail.com

Studio: https://redscale.itch.io/

🎮 Controls 🎮

WASD: Movement

Left-Click: Shoot

1, 2 and 3 or mouse scroll: Change Weapons

Esc: Pause
